description: Automatically configure CRC32 checksums for uploads and checksum validation for downloads through the CRT transfer manager.
S3transfer now supports a wider range of CRT functionality for uploads to improve throughput in the CLI/Boto3.

Update ``target_throughput`` defaults. If not configured, s3transfer will use the AWS CRT to attempt to determine a recommended target throughput to use based on the system. If there is no recommended throughput, s3transfer now falls back to ten gigabits per second.
Add support for uploading and downloading file-like objects using CRT transfer manager. It supports both seekable and non-seekable file-like objects.
